2173.subject: HDEV
2173.descrlong:
Risk and Resiliency in Families investigates the challenges, stressors, and crises experienced by individuals and families across the lifespan.  Focus is given to protective factors and resilience, coping strategies, and prevention and intervention.  (May be offered as classroom-based, hybrid, or online.) (Credit/No Credit Available)

(Prereq: Junior or Senior Standing)
